text: (he nabee!) aap unaka, jo eemaan laaye hain, sabase kada shatru yahoodiyon tatha mishranavaadiyon ko paayenge aur jo eemaan laaye hain, unake sabase adhik sameep aap unhen paayenge, jo apane ko eesaee kahate hain. ye baat isalie hai ki unamen upaasak tatha sanyaasee hain aur ve abhimaan[1] nahin karate
